required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Mass Balance and Biotransformation of [14C]SHR4640 in Chinese Healthy Adult Male Volunteers.
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Mass Balance and Biotransformation Study of [14C]SHR4640 in Chinese Healthy Adult Male Volunteers.

brief_summary.textblock: Study to Evaluate the Mass Balance and Biotransformation of Single Dose [14C]SHR4640 in Chinese healthy adult male volunteers.

primary_outcome.measure: Quantitive analysis of whole radioactivity of excrement of orally administered [14C]SHR4640 in Chinese healthy adult male volunteers to obtain the mass balance data and the main excretion pathway in human body by liquid scintillation counter.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 10 days (approx) from the start of administration.
primary_outcome.description: The percentage of radioactive dose of [14C] radiolabelled SHR4640 recovered in urine, faeces and in total, up to Day 10 (approx).

primary_outcome.measure: Quantitive analysis of the concentrations of SHR4640 in plasma using the validated LC-MS/MS to obtain pharmacokinetic data.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 10 days (approx) from the start of administration.
primary_outcome.description: The concentrations of SHR4640 in plasma up to Day 10.

primary_outcome.measure: Identification of the main metabolite and biotransformation pathway of SHR4640 and investigation of metabolite in plasma by LC-HR MS.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 10 days (approx) from the start of administration.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events (AEs) and Serious Adverse Events.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 10 days (approx) from the start of administration.
secondary_outcome.description: Laboratory indicators, 12-lead electrocardiogram (ECG), physical examination,vital signs, adverse events (NCI-CTC AE 5.0), etc.

arm_group.description: Patients will receive single dose of [14C]SHR4640 (Suspension, 10mg/80μCi).

intervention.description: Patients will receive single dose of orally [14C]SHR4640 on Day 1.
